title: I know this has been said a thousand times but Bot lane needs to lose some power
body:
And shift some of that influence to Top lane. 

Honestly, all of this is partially our fault as well for complaining that supports felt unrewarding to play. Riot made the changes and it resulted in games being decided by whether your botlane gets autofilled or not. 

Another issue is reducing the game time for more action-packed gameplay and overbuffing ADCs. This completely threw the game's balance off, along with actually strategic gameplay. 

What we have now:
- bruisers being crap, unless fed like hell
- Winning botlane determines the outcome of the game
- There is no strategic gameplay. What matters is if you pick the best snowballing champions. 
- If you lose lane, there is no making a comeback on lategame champions
- Once a team gets a small lead, they do not have to work to keep that lead. It's easy cruising and one-sided stomping the shit out of the other team. 

I know balance has never been perfect for this game but the current problems at hand make our old balance issues seem so trivial. Remember when we used to complain about Zed being too strong to lane against as a mage? Or when we complained about the facerolling Katarina and Akali? At least back then you could work as a team to stop them. Right now.. it's just one-sided stomp game after game after game.
